Song.title: How Great Is Your Faithfulness
Song.copyright: By Jonas Myrin, Matt Redman (c)2009 Thankyou Music, sixsteps Music, Said And Done Music (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing) SHOUT! Publishing (Admin. by Integrity Music, Inc.)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Now u[C]nto the K[G]ing who r[D]eigns over [Em7]all, And n[C]ever ch[G]anges or t[D]urns [C]Unfailing j[G]ustice, [D]unfading g[Em7]race, Whose p[C]romis[G/B]es rem[D]ain, Yes, Your p[C]romis[G/B]es rem[D]ain.
Chorus: The h[G]eavens [D/F#]ring, the [Em7]saints all [C2]sing, G[G]reat is your f[D]aithful[Em7]ness [C2] From [G]age to [D/F#]age we [Em7]will proc[C2]laim G[G]reat is your f[D]aithful[Em7]ness, [C2] How [G]great is your f[D]aithful[G]ness. [D/F# Em7 G D/F# Em7]
Verse 2: [C]Everything ch[G]anges, but y[D]ou stay the s[Em7]ame; Your W[C]ord and kin[G]gdom end[D]ure We l[C]ean on the pr[G]omise of [D]all that you [Em7]are, And t[C]rust for[G/B]ever[D]more We will [C]trust for[G/B]ever[D]more
Bridge: From g[C2]enera[G]tion to g[D]ener[Em7]ation [C2]You never f[G]ailed us [D]O God Y[C2]ester[G]day and tod[D]ay and tom[Em7]orrow Un[F]til the day you re[Dsus | Dsus ]turn
Ending: How g[G]reat is your f[D]aithfu[Em7]lness [C2] How g[G]reat is your f[D]aithfu[G]lness [D/F# Em7 C G D/F# Em7 C G]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 now unto the king who reigns over all and never changes or turns unfailing justice unfading grace whose promises remain yes your promises remain chorus the heavens ring the saints all sing great is your faithfulness from age to age we will proclaim great is your faithfulness how great is your faithfulness verse 2 everything changes but you stay the same your word and kingdom endure we lean on the promise of all that you are and trust forevermore we will trust forevermore bridge from generation to generation you never failed us o god yesterday and today and tomorrow until the day you return ending how great is your faithfulness how great is your faithfulness
